alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Benson; Cavalier; Eddy; Griggs; Nelson; Ramsey; Ransom; Sargent; Towner; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 2:00PM CST until December 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THURSDAY TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches Thursday. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, light snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches through Wednesday night. * WHERE...Portions of eastern North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 9 AM Thursday to 6 AM CST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Heavy snow rates and blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Near blizzard conditions are possible in open country. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute Thursday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
